@gunan as I mentioned, given point 4.¹ bazel I see hard to to build with the requirements 1. 2. and 3. that most distributions have (maven is already a pain), so even if the bazel build files get improved to look for system libraries first, the problems with bazel, its bootstrapping and dragging of the maven ecosystem will prevail.

Do you see this different, that bazel can get properly packaged by Linux distributions? am I missing something here?.
